mapper.select: SELECT ifcgSeq, ifcgName, ifcgNickName, ifcgGender, ifcgVerify, ifcgDelNy FROM codeGroup WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY ifcgSeq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO codeGroup ( ifcgSeq, ifcgName, ifcgNickName, ifcgGender, ifcgVerify, ifcgDelNy ) values ( #{ifcgSeq}, #{ifcgName}, #{ifcgNickName}, #{ifcgGender}, #{ifcgVerify}, #{ifcgDelNy} )
mapper.update: UPDATE codeGroup SET ifcgName = #{ifcgName}, ifcgNickName = #{ifcgNickName}, ifcgGender = #{ifcgGender}, ifcgVerify = #{ifcgVerify}, ifcgDelNy = #{ifcgDelNy} WHERE ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
